// Function from mplungjan on Stack Overflow
var nth=function nth(d){if(d>3&&d<21)return'th';switch(d%10){case 1:return"st";case 2:return"nd";case 3:return"rd";default:return"th";}};// Year
var year=2021;var d=new Date();var endDate=new Date();// Setting the days in which it starts and ends
d.setFullYear(year,8,18);endDate.setFullYear(year,9,17);// The start and end days
var startDay="".concat(d.toLocaleDateString('default',{month:'long'})," ").concat(d.getDate()).concat(nth(d.getDate()));var endDay="".concat(endDate.toLocaleDateString('default',{month:'long'})," ").concat(endDate.getDate()).concat(nth(endDate.getDate()));// How long the Faire has been happening
var yearOfFaire=year-1998+"rd";// Shopping Day
var shopDay="Monday, October 12th";// Weekends
var wknd=[];var wkndList=[];for(var i=0;i<10;i+=2){if(wknd.length===0){wknd[i]=new Date();wknd[i].setFullYear(year,d.getMonth(),d.getDate());wknd[i+1]=new Date();wknd[i+1].setFullYear(year,d.getMonth(),d.getDate()+1);}else{wknd[i]=new Date();wknd[i].setFullYear(year,wknd[i-1].getMonth(),wknd[i-2].getDate()+7);wknd[i+1]=new Date();wknd[i+1].setFullYear(year,wknd[i-1].getMonth(),wknd[i-1].getDate()+7);}wkndList.push("".concat(wknd[i].toLocaleDateString('default',{month:'long'})," ").concat(wknd[i].getDate()).concat(nth(wknd[i].getDate())," & ").concat(wknd[i+1].toLocaleDateString('default',{month:'long'})," ").concat(wknd[i+1].getDate()).concat(nth(wknd[i+1].getDate())));}wknd[wknd.length]=new Date();wknd[wknd.length-1].setFullYear(year,9,11);// Kegs 'N' Eggs
var earlyBird='April 3rd';var kneDay='April 10th';export var dateObject={year:2021,startDay:startDay,endDay:endDay,yearOfFaire:yearOfFaire,wkndRaw:wknd,wkndList:wkndList,shopDay:shopDay,earlyBird:earlyBird,kneSaleDay:kneDay};
